name: Gales of Reverie
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is {REALNAME[ID(1), equip this card.
After #{REALNAME[ID(1) equips this card, immediately use Hanega: Song of the Wind once.
When your #{REALNAME[ID(1), who has this card equipped, is in Windfavored state and after using Charged Attack: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 Anemo DMG.
(You must have #{REALNAME[ID(1) in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
